## Loading R packages

[p_load()](https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/pacman/versions/0.5.1/topics/p_load) of [pacman](https://trinker.github.io/pacman/vignettes/Introduction_to_pacman.html) package is used to load the tidyverse family of packages in the code chunk as follows.

```{R}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
```

```{R}
realis <- read_csv("data/realis2019.csv")
```

```{R}
ggplot(data = realis,
       aes(x = `Unit Price ($ psm)`)) +
  geom_histogram()
```
